translations: 大量，丰富；繁荣，富裕；数量，丰度；（纸牌惠斯特用语）独得九墩

sentences.sentence: The Canada lynx shows a ten-year cycle of abundance that parallels the abundance cycle of hares.
sentences.translation: 加拿大猞猁的丰饶周期为10年，与野兔的丰饶周期相似。

sentences.sentence: Fruit and vegetables grew in abundance on the island.
This area of Mexico has an abundance of safe beaches and a pleasing climate.
sentences.translation: 墨西哥的这个地区有大量的安全沙滩与宜人的气候。
